scripts.build: npm --prefix ./region_picker/ run build; npm --prefix ./app/ run build; npm --prefix ./record_suggestion/ run build; npm --prefix ./admin/ run build; cp ./app/node_modules/datatables/media/css/jquery.dataTables.min.css ./dist/; cp ./node_modules/ol/ol.css ./dist/
scripts.devbuild: npm --prefix ./region_picker/ run devbuild; npm --prefix ./app/ run devbuild; npm --prefix ./record_suggestion/ run devbuild; npm --prefix ./admin/ run devbuild; cp ./app/node_modules/datatables/media/css/jquery.dataTables.min.css ./dist/; cp ./node_modules/ol/ol.css ./dist/
scripts.install: npm --prefix ./region_picker/ install; npm --prefix ./app/ install; npm --prefix ./record_suggestion/ install; npm --prefix ./admin/ install
